channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Service Interconnect 1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Service Interconnect 1

item.title: CVE-2024-6535|2024-07-19T15:42:10.722Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20service%20interconnect%201
item.description: A flaw was found in Skupper. When Skupper is initialized with the console-enabled and with console-auth set to Openshift, it configures the openshift oauth-proxy with a static cookie-secret. In certain circumstances, this may allow an attacker to bypass authentication to the Skupper console via a specially-crafted cookie.
